comments.en:
Multifunction device: print/copy/scan/fax.

High-end variation of the OfficeJet G55 theme, with automatic document feeder (ADF), fax capability, print duplexer, and JetDirect 170X print server; see that entry for scanning and other driver information. Use the HPLIP, "cdj970" or "pcl3" driver for duplex support, the HPLIP from HP gives the best output quality.

To get all functionality of this printer working under Linux, especially also the non-printing features, like scanning, printer status, maintenance, and photo download from memory cards, use the HPLIP driver package from HP.
